name: Flight Ventures Aviation Academy
about: Flight Ventures Aviation Academy, located at French Valley Airport (F70) in Murrieta, California, is a full-service flight school offering both rotor and fixed-wing training. Founded on the principle that flight training should mirror real-world experiences, the academy provides a comprehensive program from private pilot to advanced certifications like CFII, MEI, and ATP. With a 6,500 square foot classroom and 12,000 square foot hangar space, the academy ensures maximum learning time. Safety is the top priority, and instructors are hand-picked to meet the highest industry standards. The school also features state-of-the-art helicopter and fixed-wing flight simulators and offers various financing options. By choosing Flight Ventures Aviation Academy, students can achieve their aviation goals in a professional and supportive environment.
services:
